title: Angela Rayner – 2023 Comments on Tax Affairs of Nadhim Zahawi
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Rayner, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, on Twitter on 21 January 2023.
content:
Nadhim Zahawi’s story about his tax affairs doesn’t add up. After months of denials, the truth emerges.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

His position is untenable. Rishi Sunak must dismiss him from his Cabinet.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
